title: Gofore Oyj
description: Working as a consultant in both big public sector projects and smaller private projects. Working onspot and with international teams remotely. Role included for instance building application frontend from the ground up, planning the arcitecture and designing accessible UI.

title: Self employed
description: Designing and building websites with Wordpress for small companies and entrepreneurs. Coding wordpress themes with PHP, CSS and Javascript, and setting up servers and domains for customers. In addition to programming I also did photography, mainly shooting weddings.
